channel.title: Banner please?
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QufpCOV.jpg[/img]
If someone could make my Squad a banner I will highly appreciate it and give you full credits, as I believe in honesty.
I would like the banner to have the same [b]Text, Text Fonts, Text Color[/b]. I would like the L to be bigger than ebrican, and little below and above it. For the background I want it transparent. I also want a little mascot. For the mascot I want it to be a red bird(preferably a cardinal).
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: Banner please?
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
